Alias.name: frp
Alias.script:
-- Provide a color-coded vitals report to your formation -- 3985/3990hp 3645/3645sp 2936/2941st
local chp = gmcp.char.vitals.hp local csp = gmcp.char.vitals.sp local cst = gmcp.char.vitals.st
local mhp = gmcp.char.maxstats.maxhp local msp = gmcp.char.maxstats.maxsp local mst = gmcp.char.maxstats.maxst
local thp = "|R"..chp.."/"..mhp.."hp" local tsp = "|C"..csp.."/"..msp.."sp" local tst = "|G"..cst.."/"..mst.."st"
send("ft "..thp.." "..tsp.." "..tst, false)
